params.amount: Amount of bad debt to cover

returns.covered: Amount actually covered (may be less if fund depleted)

returns.factor: Multiplier for risk parameters (1e18 = 100%)  When fund is healthy: factor = 1.0 (no adjustment) When fund is warning: factor = 0.75 (reduce leverage by 25%) When fund is critical: factor = 0.5 (reduce leverage by 50%)

canCoverLoss(uint256).notice: Check if fund can cover potential bad debt

coverBadDebt(uint256).notice: Cover bad debt from underwater liquidation

deposit(uint256).notice: Direct deposit (for initial funding or top-ups)

getAdjustedMaxLeverage(uint256).notice: Get maximum leverage adjustment based on fund health

getAdjustedMaxOI(uint256).notice: Get maximum OI adjustment based on fund health

getHealthStatus().notice: Get current health status of the insurance fund

getRiskAdjustmentFactor().notice: Get risk adjustment factor based on fund health
